page.title: 16GOVERNMENT
page.content: The M.P. for the area is Archie Kirkwood a Liberal and the member for the European Parliament is Alistair Hutton. The area is part of the Borders Region and is represented on the Council by Neil Thompson. At local level the District Councillor is Sarah Gillie. The area has a Community Council which consists of 9 elected people to discuss local issues and advise the Regional and District Councillors as required. The major local authority services eg. roads,water,sewage,education,social work ect.are provided by the Regional Council at St. Boswells and the District Council based at Hawick, is responsible for services such as council housing,refuse collection, burial grounds and environmental health.
